thread.title: Jeremy Corbyn a 'big hit' with Glaswegian hen party
thread.title_full: Jeremy Corbyn a 'big hit' with Glaswegian hen party

author: Laura Hughes
title: Jeremy Corbyn a 'big hit' with Glaswegian hen party
text:
Jeremy Corbyn Jeremy Corbyn a 'big hit' with Glaswegian hen party Jeremy Corbyn has been hailed a "big hit" after giving an impromptu speech to the group of women on the London to Glasgow service Jeremy Corbyn addresses the hen party Photo: Henry Bell By Laura Hughes , Political Correspondent 1:42PM BST 02 Oct 2015 
Jeremy Corbyn has been hailed a "big hit" after addressing a hen party on a train. 
The Labour leader have an impromptu speech to the group of women on the London to Glasgow service. 
However, he "politely" asked for some of the photographs taken of him and the hen party not to be published amid concerns they were too crude. Corbyn's mwi supporting the people's war. pic.twitter.com/1zh9lLhKBw 
Ed Miliband was pictured with a group of women on a hen party during the general election campaign, after he was spotted stepping out of his campaign coach. 
One member of the hen party later told LBC: "Bless him he looked terrified, absolutely terrified. And he wouldnâ€™t actually come off the bus. He was just kind of lingering on the steps, waving sort of tentatively." 
Selfie, selfie! Ed Miliband mobbed by hen party in Chester Photo: CHESTER CHRONICLE
